item.title: Docs: v3.8.13
item.description:
发布时间 2022-06-28 14:56:44

cloudpods

仓库地址: https://github.com/yunionio/cloudpods

9 commits to cloudpods - v3.8.13 since this release.

Bug Fixes (7)

  • scheduler options not updated by OptionManager (282cbb1624, Qiu Jian)
  • imageinfo.OsInfo empty for 3.8 (#14507) (49e1495417, Jian Qiu)
  • splitable auto_incremental steps should be more than 1 (in case of HA setup) (#14501) (63b9bb0167, Jian Qiu)
  • climc create aksk not return access_key (#14485) (2b107a960d, Jian Qiu)
  • region: not delete groupnetwork when deleting guest (#14490) (d94ca385bb, Jian Qiu)
  • region: azure region city (8c5199ae84, ioito)
  • telegraf-raid-plugin: release-1.6.4 image (30f2619fd8, Zexi Li)

Host_health (1)

  • auto migrate on host shutdown (#14525) (db90c90dda, wanyaoqi)

Others (1)

  • Automated cherry pick of #14497: fix(region,host): auto migrate on host down (#14511) (340cf2fab9, wanyaoqi)

cloudpods-operator

仓库地址: https://github.com/yunionio/cloudpods-operator

3 commits to cloudpods-operator - v3.8.13 since this release.

Bug Fixes (2)

  • update DefaultTelegrafRaidImageTag to release-1.6.4 (fe981341, Zexi Li)
  • operator: use telegraf-init release-1.19.2-0 (4afa2e59, Zexi Li)

Others (1)

  • etcd-operator: remove fix etcd size, pod anti affinity required (56d536c6, wanyaoqi)

dashboard

仓库地址: https://github.com/yunionio/dashboard

7 commits to dashboard - v3.8.13 since this release.

Bug Fixes (6)

  • #8462 镜像市场从ISO导入arm的镜像后，该ISO的cpu架构不应该是x86的 (557490437, gaomingjiu@yunion.cn)
  • #8457 通过api新建的虚拟机开机状态下调整配置，套餐列表不应该显示加载中 (7899f80fd, gaomingjiu@yunion.cn)
  • #8457 通过api新建的虚拟机开机状态下调整配置，套餐列表不应该显示加载中 (adb13a8e8, gaomingjiu@yunion.cn)
  • missing instance group text in ip list (ae2edddd5, Qiu Jian)
  • 调整监控数据参数 (ced241069, gaomingjiu@yunion.cn)
  • monitor: no data in response (50ca22c3e, Zexi Li)

Features (1)

  • #3829 license申请跳转路径问题 (1681083a3, GuoLiBin6)

ocadm

仓库地址: https://github.com/yunionio/ocadm

1 commits to ocadm - v3.8.13 since this release.

Bug Fixes (1)

  • not wait cloudnet component (47db420f, Zexi Li)

item.title: Docs: v3.8.12
item.description:
发布时间 2022-06-16 10:42:55

cloudpods

仓库地址: https://github.com/yunionio/cloudpods

28 commits to cloudpods - v3.8.12 since this release.

Bug Fixes (22)

  • remove virtio-blk num-queues param (3d9a825243, Qiu Jian)
  • keystoen cronman use uninitialized admin token (#14441) (9cc78f1463, Jian Qiu)
  • manage_ntp_configuration not effective (#14428) (828643166d, Jian Qiu)
  • hide server rtc_change event log (#14336) (d2415d0033, Jian Qiu)
  • server associate eip check (#14341) (fce049d24a, Jian Qiu)
  • recover host status if maintain an empty host (f4fc88fc74, Qiu Jian)
  • allow set pagination order (#14357) (3e60efb32c, Jian Qiu)
  • more detailed log for server hange_config (#14361) (b2867062bc, Jian Qiu)
  • disable disk multi-queue (9492e3aa20, Qiu Jian)
  • cloudevent: allow disable sync cloudevent (#14448) (f2070dc854, 屈轩)
  • host: ceph pool size (f66242d72e, ioito)
  • host: Telegraf 1.19.2 conf (d061c10c3b, Zexi Li)
  • host: openvswitch service name on UOS (#14392) (e6e6e2c52e, Zexi Li)
  • region: disk save task (19227df5fb, ioito)
  • region: clean vm misc options (7e04045903, ioito)
  • region: aliyun disk external id (837f40a3ad, ioito)
  • region: public cloud user data (74140324cb, ioito)
  • region: api doc replace tab to space (fb4f8d225b, ioito)
  • region: aliyun bucket access url (13948c87f7, ioito)
  • region: eip allocate (#14391) (856bff47c3, 屈轩)
  • region: add filter for eip (507c2922ec, ioito)
  • region: eip update (#14320) (42bf085392, 屈轩)

Feature (1)

  • fetch options of an application via api (#14395) (0dbbd1c4fc, Jian Qiu)

Features (2)

  • baremetal: wrap pxe error (#14461) (97a18aaed9, Zexi Li)
  • region,host: support multiqueues on vhost network (#14459) (a208f0afb7, Jian Qiu)

Others (3)

  • fix(region):资源统计bug，已使用资源统计包含裸金属资源，总数未包含，导致资源使用率统计异常。 guestUsage统计中排除掉裸金属资源，hypervisors.Delete(api.HYPERVISOR_CONTAINER, api.HYPERVISOR_BAREMETAL) (#14403) (1d8009083a, Jian Qiu)
  • update vendor release/3.8 20220604 (#14401) (56b1d9e7fb, Jian Qiu)
  • add options to set disk driver and cachemode (81992ba365, Qiu Jian)

cloudpods-operator

仓库地址: https://github.com/yunionio/cloudpods-operator

8 commits to cloudpods-operator - v3.8.12 since this release.

Bug Fixes (5)

  • fail to compile due to vendor issue (e4d3090f, Qiu Jian)
  • minor fixes for 3.8 (e371d1ac, Qiu Jian)
  • operator: match etcd and grpc version (aaef4fdd, Zexi Li)
  • telegraf: use release-1.19.2-0 image (23fc5429, Zexi Li)
  • vendor: sync vendor to match etcd and grpc mod (67591341, Zexi Li)

Feature (1)

  • add disable_local_vpc, enable_cloud_net, enable_s3gateway var (44fc7c7b, Qiu Jian)

Others (2)

  • codegent (3fcd0823, Qiu Jian)
  • update vendor 20220605 (30862ea9, Qiu Jian)

dashboard

仓库地址: https://github.com/yunionio/dashboard

20 commits to dashboard - v3.8.12 since this release.

Bug Fixes (11)

  • i18n (e1b4e078a, gaomingjiu@yunion.cn)
  • #8441 修改VNC连接禁用文案提示信息 (f47185af6, gaomingjiu@yunion.cn)
  • #8440 eip 飞天支持带宽展示 (7c426c492, GuoLiBin6)
  • #8405 修复 按固定单位转换数值函数-无法像高级单位转换问题 (d9bae9f62, GuoLiBin6)
  • #8425 kvm的宿主机上虚拟机数量0，进入维护模式模式按钮应该置灰不可点击 (b10f7d948, mj)
  • #8421 新建cloudpods云账号时，点击获取密钥的详情文档时url应该传递正确 (7f04e9dfd, mj)
  • remove debuger console (3c00fa45f, gaomingjiu@yunion.cn)
  • #8362 包年包月的虚拟机调整配置时，磁盘返写不应该为空 (1413b1c30, gaomingjiu@yunion.cn)
  • lb操作验证错误 (0c92d3750, GuoLiBin6)
  • #8419 VMware主机更换镜像后，不会更新系统盘的大小 (7c3f65592, gaomingjiu@yunion.cn)
  • #8366 下载方式优化 (b1c08c9cf, GuoLiBin6)

Features (9)

  • 更新多网卡队列增加条件限制 (46cc2df3f, gaomingjiu@yunion.cn)
  • #3825 私有云虚拟机网卡多队列支持 (df968dc83, gaomingjiu@yunion.cn)
  • #3803 mfa验证 (1b19c7d4f, GuoLiBin6)
  • #3803 主机重装系统增加mfa验证 (7d28be184, GuoLiBin6)
  • #3757 eip绑定资源提示优化 (75c283e6f, GuoLiBin6)
  • #3808 设置代理文案修改 (106565a84, GuoLiBin6)
  • #3783 短信页面的进入控制台统一都改成 登录阿里云控制台 (8a9f1048e, gaomingjiu@yunion.cn)
  • #3797 新建邮箱通知渠道时，给发件人邮箱增加提示说明 (c31f28b1a, gaomingjiu@yunion.cn)
  • #3757 eip绑定资源提示优化 (ac2257a74, GuoLiBin6)

sdnagent

仓库地址: https://github.com/yunionio/sdnagent

1 commits to sdnagent - v3.8.12 since this release.

Others (1)

  • disable security group (6d97840, Qiu Jian)

item.title: Docs: v3.8.9
item.description:

cloudpods

Bug Fixes (41)

  • region: avoid panic (aa4aa35bd4, ioito)
  • region: make access_ip of host updatable (800cca4222, Zexi Li)
  • region: qcloud use new dns api (89c2b86989, ioito)

item.description:
